original_text: Then Jehoahaz sought the favor of the Lord, and the Lord listened to him, for he saw the oppression of Israel, how the king of Syria oppressed them.
korean_text: 아람 왕이 이스라엘을 학대하므로 여호아하스가 여호와께 간구하매 여호와께서 들으셨으니 이는 그들이 학대받음을 보셨음이라

sentences.original_text: Then Jehoahaz sought the favor of the Lord
and the Lord listened to him
for he saw the oppression of Israel
how the king of Syria oppressed them
